data.name: plRootURL.Help
data.value: The portal home directory relative Url of the top-level gallery folder (ie. /DotNetNuke_2/Portals/0/Gallery/). Caution: Only change the Root Url after albums and/or files have been added if you are certain you know what your are doing as current gallery content will NOT be copied over to the new directory automatically.

data.name: plSkin.Help
data.value: The theme that will be used for this gallery module.

data.name: plQuota.Help
data.value:
The disk space usage limit permitted by all files in a gallery.
(In KB)
Tip
It is recommended that you limit the gallery size

data.name: plMaxFileSize.Help
data.value:
The maximum size (in kb) of a single file that may be uploaded.
If you need to permit uploads of files larger than the lesser of the maxRequestLength or requestLengthDiskThreshold set in the httpRuntime section of the site's web.config, it will also be necessary to increase those limits and possibly the executionTimeout.
Tip
It is recommended to keep this value relatively small to avoid long loading times for images.

data.name: plAutoApproval.Help
data.value:
If checked, file additions to a gallery are approved immediately and on display.
Tip
Unapproved additions can only be accessed by a module administrator for approval via the Album Edit menu item.

data.name: plBuildCacheOnStart.Help
data.value:
If checked, gallery will cache file and module configuration data.
Tip
It is recommended to use this feature to enhance performance.

data.name: plCategoryValues.Help
data.value: The values listed for categories in this gallery.

data.name: plGalleryTitle.Help
data.value: The title of this gallery module.

data.name: plImageExtensions.Help
data.value:
File extensions for images that are permitted in this gallery.
Tip
Limit image extension types to known image extensions that are compatible with the web.

data.name: plMediaExtensions.Help
data.value:
File extensions for video that are permitted in this gallery.
Tip
Limit video file extension types to those known compatible for web viewing.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: A brief description of this gallery module.

data.name: plFixedWidth.Help
data.value:
Image width
(In px). You must delete all albums and images from the gallery before changing this setting.

data.name: plFixedHeight.Help
data.value:
Image height
(In px). You must delete all albums and images from the gallery before changing this setting.

data.name: plStripWidth.Help
data.value: The number of thumbnails permitted for display from left to right in a single row.

data.name: plStripHeight.Help
data.value: The number of thumbnails permitted for display from top to bottom in a single column.

data.name: plMaxThumbWidth.Help
data.value:
Thumbnail frame width
(In px). You must delete all albums and images from the gallery before changing this setting.

data.name: plMaxThumbHeight.Help
data.value:
Thumbnail frame height
(In px). You must delete all albums and images from the gallery before changing this setting.

data.name: plDisplay.Help
data.value: Information about each media item that will be displayed.

data.name: plSortProperties.Help
data.value: The properties which a user may sort a gallery by.

data.name: plGallerySort.Help
data.value:
The default property used to sort images in the gallery.
Can be sorted ascending or descending.

data.name: plGalleryView.Help
data.value:
The default view a user will see when they enter the gallery.
If visitors can change view is checked, this means the users are permitted to select their own view property.

data.name: plSlideshowSpeed.Help
data.value: The speed the slideshow will move in milliseconds.

data.name: plSlideshow.Help
data.value: If checked, this enables the slideshow option.

data.name: plPopup.Help
data.value:
If checked, this enables the gallery popup viewer.
If not, images will display in page.
Tip
It is not known what popup blockers will block this feature.

data.name: plMultiLevelMenu.Help
data.value:
All gallery hierarchy will be listed in module navigation menu.
When disabled, only the current level is listed.

data.name: plWatermark.Help
data.value:
If checked, this enables a watermark image for each album.
Tip
Upload the file you want as a watermark to this gallery and name it watermark and it will mask all images in the an album with this image.
Must be one in each album to use feature.

data.name: plExif.Help
data.value: If checked, enables users to view picture Metadata.

data.name: plVoting.Help
data.value: If checked, enables users to vote and comment on media.

data.name: plDownload.Help
data.value: If checked, enables users to download gallery media.

data.name: plDownloadRoles.Help
data.value: The portal roles which are permitted to download gallery media files.

data.name: plPrivate.Help
data.value: If checked, only the gallery owner is permitted to add files and sub albums. Any users who have view rights to the module can see the gallery contents that are approved.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Gallery - Configuration

All configuration of the module is handled here. Please see help tips if a certain area is unclear to its meaning.

data.name: plMaxPendingUploadsSize.Help
data.value: The maximum size in kb to which the files pending upload may grow before the pending uploads are committed to storage. An entry of '0' means no limitation. A maximum of 20000 kb or about 20 mb is permitted.

data.name: plCreatedDate.Help
data.value: Date and time this gallery module was added to the page. Cannot be changed manually.

data.name: RootURL.ErrorMessage
data.value: Root URL of the gallery must be relative to the portal home directory and not contain any invalid characters. Use of ../ is not permitted.

data.name: lblMaxFileSizeWarning.Text
data.value: Value exceeds limits imposed in web.config. Please click on Help ? icon for more information!

data.name: MaxFileSizeLimits.Text
data.value:
Current limitations set in web.config are as follows:
maxRequestLength - {0} kb
requestLengthDiskThreshold - {1} kb
executionTimeout - {2} sec.

data.name: plEncoderQuality.Help
data.value: Sets the desired compression level (encoder quality) with which JPEG images are saved. Range: (worst) 10-100 (best)

data.name: plDefaultAlbum.Help
data.value: Select the album that should be initially opened when browsing to a page containing the Gallery module.
